Class pyglet.font.base.GlyphTextureAtlas

image.AbstractImage --+    
                      |    
          image.Texture --+
                          |
                         GlyphTextureAtlas
A texture within which glyphs can be drawn.

class (subclass of TextureRegion) region_class

Method Details

fit

fit(self, image)
Place image within this texture.
Parameters:
image : pyglet.image.AbstractImage
Image to place within the texture.
Returns:
Glyph: The glyph representing the image from this texture, or None if the image doesn't fit.
